attributes.action: UKIP Leader should be present at Remembrance Sunday  Ceremony
attributes.additional_details: Following UKIP winning the Euro Elections, their substantial gains in Local Government and their recent winning of a Westminster seat, it is right and proper that Nigel Farage be present at the Remembrance Sunday Ceremony in Whitehall to represent the millions of people that have voted for UKIP and in honour of their family and friends that have given their lives for our freedoms today.
